localisation.paragraphe: Located on the Grand-Bornand's village, at 1 hour from Geneva and 2h30 from Lyon

paragraphe.1: The chalet offer to you a place of relaxation on its alpage with a view on the Grand-Bornand valley and the Avaris moutains chain.
paragraphe.2: With its 5 cozy rooms with multiple amenities, you have the possibility to book the rooms per nights or the whole chalet.

paragraphe.1: Tourist resort and charming village, the Grand-Bornand lives all year round in its Alps setting, dominated by the Avaris chain
paragraphe.2: Enjoy its ski resort in winter, its swimming center or its hiking and mountain biking routes in summer

gypaete-barbu.paragraphe: With a bit of luck or a good eye, you should catch sight of the Gypaète Barbu in the sky, protected species whose the reintroduction on the Haut-Savoyard territory begin in 1987, with a first successful nesting in 1997 on the Bargy mountain chain, 20 minutes from the Grand-Bornand village.
